channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Journalists: How to Report on the Political Opinions of People in Prisons and Jails in Your State
item.description: More than 54,000 incarcerated people in 45 states shared their views on the presidential election in The Marshall Project’s landmark political survey.

item.title: Senior sprinter Julia 'Hurricane' Hawkins dies at 108
item.description: Hawkins became a darling of the track and field world when she took up running at 100 years old. She died in Baton Rouge, La., this week.

item.title: Nail Fungus or Psoriasis? How to Tell Them Apart
item.description: Although they have similar symptoms, nail psoriasis and nail fungus require different treatments. Learn how to identify the signs of each condition.
